name: 创建存储卷时输入不符合规则的存储卷名称(包含符号@)
fullName: TestCase.testProject.TestProject#test_project[4-/api/v1/namespaces/test-project/persistentvolumeclaims-{"apiVersion":"v1","kind":"PersistentVolumeClaim","metadata":{"namespace":"test-project","name":"test@volume1","labels":{},"annotations":{"kubesphere.io/creator":"admin"}},"spec":{"accessModes":["ReadWriteOnce"],"resources":{"requests":{"storage":"10Gi"}},"storageClassName":"csi-standard"},"create_way":"storageclass"}-存储管理-存储卷-创建存储卷时输入不符合规则的存储卷名称(包含符号@)-post-normal-r.json()['message']-PersistentVolumeClaim "test@volume1" is invalid: metadata.name: Invalid value: "test@volume1": a DNS-1123 subdomain must consist of lower case alphanumeric characters, '-' or '.', and must start and end with an alphanumeric character (e.g. 'example.com', regex used for validation is '[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*[a-z0-9])?(\.[a-z0-9]([-a-z0-9]*
